articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Main Industrial Establishments in Hamhung City
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Main Industrial Establishments in Hamhung City
 Hamhung, December 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made field survey of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					 He encouraged the workers, technicians and officials there and convened consultative meetings after learning in detail about the production and projects for increasing the capacities of the complexes.
					
					 The consultative meetings discussed the issues of bringing about great leap forward in the production of Juche fertilizer, vinalon and custom-built equipment, more scrupulously organizing business and enterprise management and pushing forward the work for putting production processes on a Juche and modern basis.
					
					 The meetings underscored the need for the relevant units to send necessary raw and other materials in good time in a responsible manner.
					
					 The premier also went round the Hamhung Branch of the State Academy of Sciences. He stressed the need to deepen scientific researches for establishing C1 chemical industry.

articles.title: Participants in 5th Conference of Party Cell Chairs Renew Pledge
articles.content:
Participants in 5th Conference of Party Cell Chairs Renew Pledge
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting here on Tuesday to adopt a letter of pledge by the participants in the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The letter of pledge to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.
					
					 It said that the historic speech "Let Us Strengthen Party Cells into Loyal Cells, into Vanguard Ranks for the Implementation of the Party's Policies" made by Kim Jong Un at the Conference is the great programme which indicated the path for putting the Party cell work at present on a fresh stage and strengthening the leadership and militant efficiency of the Party in every way.
					
					 The participants in the Conference will make all the Party cells loyal cells and vanguard ranks for the implementation of the Party's policies as intended by the Supreme Leader, the letter said, expressing the will to make all the Party cells the society for rallying comrades fully prepared with the spirit of defending the leader unto death in the era of Kim Jong Un and cells of genuine comrades and comrades-in-arms of the Supreme Leader throwing in their lot with the Party in any storms and tempest.
					
					 It stated that they will become citadel stones firmly upholding the bulwark of single-minded unity, the strongest weapon of the Korean revolution, by thoroughly embodying the Juche-oriented outlook on the people.
					
					 It said they will become absolute protectors, active agitators and strict implementers of the Party's policies and thus smash all despicable sanctions and pressure of all hues of enemies and become scouts in implementing the Party's policies and the first standard-bearers of self-reliance making a breach for carrying out the five-year strategy for national economic development. 
					
					 All the Party cell chairpersons will become core elements of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, strong ones who overcome difficulties in the spirit of the blizzards of Mt Paektu and able ones of self-reliance creating things out of nothing, the letter added. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, Pak Kwang Ho, Kim Phyong Hae, Thae Jong Su, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Pak Thae Song, Choe Hwi and Pak Thae Dok, vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK, and the participants in the 5th Conference of the Party Cell Chairpersons.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Japan
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Japan
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea on Tuesday with the approach of the sixth anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 On the same day he received a floral basket from the family of Sin Kanemaru, former vice prime minister of Japan.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the New Year Juche 107 (2018).
					 The basket and letter were handed over to Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho by Pham Viet Hung, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK, and Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, on behalf of the corps on Tuesday.

articles.title: New Catfish Harvester Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Catfish Harvester Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A new catfish harvester is widely being used at the Pyongyang, Samchon and other catfish farms of the DPRK. 
					 It was developed by the Ferrous Mining Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 O Su Nam, head of the institute, told KCNA:
					
					 The catfish harvester is a labor-saving one.
					
					 When visiting the Pyongyang Catfish Farm in October Juche 104 (2015), respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un saw modern and efficient equipment including the catfish harvester and highly appreciated them.
					
					 True to the intention of the respected Supreme Leader, scientists made a new catfish harvester and introduced it into the Samchon Catfish Farm.
					
					 It can catch 10 tons of catfish weighing 1-1.5kg per hour, 2.5kg at the maximum.
					
					 It can save manpower by one third in catching catfish and other fishes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Great Change in Work of Party Cells
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Great Change in Work of Party Cells
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday editorially calls upon all Party cell chairpersons including the participants in the 5th Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea Cell Chairpersons to bring about a decisive turn in the work of the Party cells true to the idea and intention of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un personally attended the conference to guide the whole course of the conference and delivered an important speech to be specially registered in the history of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said at the conference that the Party Central Committee will more energetically conduct fresh work for the people, campaign for building a powerful socialist state in a bold and big manner. We are facing great difficulties and hardships, but we remain confident as there are hundreds of thousands of Party cell chairpersons, core elements faithful to the Party and vanguard fighters for the implementation of the Party's policies, and millions of Party members, he added.
					
					 The immortal programme put forward by Kim Jong Un at the conference comprehensively clarifies the necessity to strengthen the Party cells at present times, the issues requiring all Party chairpersons to direct efforts to strengthening the Party cells and the idea that all the Party organizations and officials should help the work of the Party cells in effectively.
					
					 The main spirit of the conference is just to bring about a fresh turn in the work to strengthen the Party and build a powerful socialist nation by making all the Party cells loyal cells, vanguard ranks for the implementation of the Party's policies.
					
					 The conference made sure that we can vigorously advance the work to strengthen the Party and build a powerful socialist nation, grasping the main objective despite the unprecedentely grim situation. Herein lies the enormous historical significance of the 5th Conference of the WPK Cell Chairpersons.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Keeping Vigilant against U.S.-touted "UN Reform"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Keeping Vigilant against U.S.-touted "UN Reform"
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the U.S. unilaterally made public a declaration on the reform of the United Nations, claiming that the UN does not fully display its potentiality owing to its bureaucratic politics and improper work style. It even held a declaration signing ceremony at a UN building and urged member nations to sign it.
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Tuesday brands this as an arrogant act of the gangster nation.
					
					 The core of the UN reform is the reform of the UN Security Council, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 The UNSC has failed to fulfill its desired role and is denounced for being an unnecessary body. The reason is because the U.S. is holding the post of a permanent member and committing high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 The U.S. call for UN reform is not to opt for the reform of the UNSC as wished by the majority of countries around the world but to reduce the organization into a body serving it better for realizing its ambition for world domination.
					
					 In disregard of the demand and interests of the UN member nations, the U.S. is going to abuse the issue of the UN reform for establishing its domination. It is, indeed, a cancer-like entity harassing the world peace and security. 
					
					 If the U.S. is allowed in its moves to reshape the UN in its interests, justice and truth will be undermined in the international relations and the world will inevitably turn into the one in which the jungle law prevails.
					
					 The international community should heighten vigilance against the U.S. ferocious moves to monopolize the UN arena and use it as a tool for realizing the world domination, and turn out in the struggle to foil the brigandish high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slashes U.S. for Updating Nuclear Weapons
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slashes U.S. for Updating Nuclear Weapons
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. test-fired an updated long-range stealth missile for B-1B on Dec. 12. The missile test-fired by the U.S. air force and "Lockheed Martin" on the coast of California is aimed at long-distance strike at an enemy's large warship sailing.
					 The U.S. is also accelerating the updating of B-52H.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Tuesday says that such moves are a vivid manifestation of the U.S. aggressive policy for realizing its ambition to dominate the world with the absolute edge of nuclear weapons at any cost.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. reckless moves for updating nuclear weapons are furthering the nuclear arms race across the world.
					
					 The U.S., a criminal who imposed nuclear disaster on humanity, is making desperate efforts to update nuclear weapons while dreaming about dominating the world with the edge of nuclear weapons. Such efforts can not be construed otherwise than dangerous and reckless act of threatening peace and future of mankind.
					
					 World peace can never be ensured as long as the U.S., the empire of evils who does not hesitate to do anything in order to realize its ambition for dominating the world, is engrossed in high-handed and arbitrary practices with nukes of tyranny nuclear stick.
					
					 The U.S. will have to pay due price for being hell-bent on nuclear threat and blackmail against humanity while wielding a nuclear stick.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms S. Korean FM's Japan Visit Confrontation and Servile Junket
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms S. Korean FM's Japan Visit Confrontation and Servile Junket
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Puppet Foreign Minister of south Korea Kang Kyong Hwa during her visit to Japan stressed the "importance of putting pressure on the north through sanctions".
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Tuesday says the aim sought by the puppet regime is to bolster the cooperation with Japan for putting pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the U.S. which fanned up the sinister intention of the puppet forces and urged Kang Kyong Hwa to visit Japan.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that during the visit the puppet regime committed the act of treachery of paving a way of reinvasion for the Abe group.
					
					 Instead of denouncing the Abe group keen on reinvasion, Kang fanned it up and chimed in with the island people whose forerunners committed the hideous crimes against humanity against the Korean women, in particular, in the past. Her senseless act can never be pardoned by the nation.
					
					 While keeping mum about the past crimes committed by Japan, she zealously asked for putting pressure on the fellow countrymen. Her despicable act proves that the present puppet authorities are made up of the same group of traitors as Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The top-class traitor Kang made the confrontation and servile junket while putting outsiders above her own nation. If she is allowed to ride roughshod, the Korean nation will suffer.
					
					 The top-class sycophantic traitors with their backs turned on the nation can not evade stern punishment by history.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays Traitor Hong Jun Phyo's Confrontation Hysteria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays Traitor Hong Jun Phyo's Confrontation Hysteria
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Traitor Hong Jun Phyo, representative of the "Liberal Korea Party" of south Korea, during his recent trip to Japan, said in a meeting with Abe that the DPRK's nuclear program can not be allowed and that south Korea, U.S. and Japan should establish a "free nuclear alliance". And in a press conference and a meeting with Japanese politicians, he called for "nuclear dismantlement through balance of nuclear force", claiming that circumstances would be created after three months in which south Korea and Japan have to go under the nuclear threat.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday terms his behavior an unpardonable thrice-cursed act of treachery inciting Japan's ambition for reinvasion and bringing a nuclear disaster to the nation.
					
					 It says: 
					
					 The purpose of Hong getting frantic in confrontation with the fellow countrymen whenever he met with the U.S. and Japan masters is not only to boost the cooperation against the DPRK rackets. His dirty intention is to have his disposition as a pro-U.S., pro-Japanese stooge acknowledged by the masters and thus gratify his greed for power.
					
					 Traitor Hong Jun Phyo had better properly know where he stands. He is the first target in the list of conservative evils that should be eradicated for the crimes he committed as a servant of Park Geun Hye and for his reckless deeds conducted to revive the conservative force severely punished by history.
					
					 Hong is a disgrace to the Korean nation and an unpardonable trouble-maker as he does not hesitate to commit any treachery to stifle the fellow countrymen without regard to the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Japan's Rubbish about "Threat from Surrounding Countries"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Japan's Rubbish about "Threat from Surrounding Countries"
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Japanese authorities blustered that they would seek the heated-up discussion for the reexamination of the "defense guidelines" from the beginning of 2018, under the pretext of "threat from surrounding countries".
					 Prime Minister Abe and Defense Minister Onodera called for "reexamining the guidelines so that they can provide defence capabilities in the true sense of words", stressing that "Korea is pushing forward nuclear and missile development, China is beefing up military capabilities and Russia is busy in its activities in the northern areas".
					
					 Their intention is to reexamine and modify the defense guidelines to be the one of "defending Japanese nationals" from "threats" from the DPRK, China and Russia.
					
					 So inveterate is the crafty traits peculiar to the island nation.
					
					 It is Japan's bad habit to find fault with others and seek its own interests as unanimously commented by the international community.
					
					 Japan is so shameless as to claim that its past blood-stained aggression, censured by humankind, was to "liberate Asia from Western European imperialists".
					
					 The ultimate purpose sought by Japan is to turn itself into a "normal state" capable of fighting a war from a "special country" which is disallowed to have the right to possess military force, to say nothing of the belligerent right, as a war defeated nation and a war criminal state.
					
					 It is trumpeting about "threat from surrounding countries" as a "legitimate pretext" for realizing this.
					
					 Toward the end of 2013 the Abe group worked out "defense guidelines" in which it expanded the essence of "security" into "international security" from national security, under the pretext of "aggravated security environment around Japan".
					
					 Here, Japan designated the DPRK as a "crucial instable factor" and specified that it would grant the "Self-Defense Forces" with the capabilities as marines as well as the capabilities for mobile deployment in order to promote "comprehensive improvement of counteraction" to "ballistic missiles" from the DPRK.
					
					 Accordingly, Japan removed political and legal huddles one after another that had stood in its way of militarization and reinvasion, and expanded the scope of the overseas military operation of the SDF after massively increasing the military spending. It has also put in place the pretext and military conditions for intervening in case of emergency on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Recently it is calling for possessing 1,000-5,000 km medium range missile which has central China and Russia within the firing range while getting keen on the access to "capabilities for attacking enemy positions" and introduction of "Aegis Usher", interceptor missile system for ground deployment.
					
					 What matters here is the reason why Japan is modifying the "defense guidelines" earlier than schedule which it had originally planned to be 10 year-term defense guidelines.
					
					 The fact that the focus of the reexamination would include tolerance of the exercise of "right to collective self-defense" and increased purchase of American arms and Japan-U.S. cooperation clearly proves the intention sought by Japan.
					
					 This amounts to a declaration that Japan would step up the preparations for aggression by citing the DPRK and neighboring countries as pretexts.
					
					 The rhetoric about "threat from surrounding areas" oft-repeated by Japan is little short of a prelude to an reinvasion aimed to paint their criminal nature of rushing headlong into turning the country into a military giant as "legitimate" and openly come out for overseas expansion.
					
					 The past history shows that loud rhetoric about "threat from surrounding areas" heard from the Japanese archipelago made the country rapidly lurch toward right and militarist and heated up the zeal for reinvasion.
					
					 The international community is required to approach with vigilance the moves of Japan whetting the sword of reinvasion by faulting others.

articles.title: Abolition of "Security Law" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of "Security Law" Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on Dec. 21 and demanded the puppet authorities to release the prisoners of conscience and abolish the "Security Law", according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers deplored the continued abuse of human rights as evidenced by the existence of prisoners of conscience and enforcement of the "Security Law" and sufferings by workers and treatment of the Teachers' Union as a "lawless organization".
					
					 The whereabouts of Kim Ryon Hui and twelve girls from the north are not known, to say nothing of probing the truth, they said.
					
					 They called for building society where human rights and democracy are guaranteed.

articles.title: Hong Jun Phyo's Visit to Japan Termed War Junket in S. Korea
articles.content:
Hong Jun Phyo's Visit to Japan Termed War Junket in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Traitor Hong Jun Phyo's visit to Japan was denounced as a sycophantic visit for a war by an editorial of south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo on Dec. 23.
					 The editorial said:
					
					 During his visit Hong at a press briefing said he came to Japan to forge south Korea-U.S.-Japan liberal nuclear alliance.
					
					 Hong denounced the present "government's" foreign policy through the expression of "having audience" but internet posted his high-profile photo of submitting to Abe along with letters denouncing the acts of "Liberal Korea Party".
					
					 Hong followed in the footsteps of his master Trump, reeling off rhetoric and making war visit.
					
					 The LKP forces has caused security crisis through acts of sycophantic treachery while standing against the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The recent visit to Japan brought to light the bellicose and sycophantic nature of Hong and his LKP.

articles.title: Fire Erupts in Suwon of S. Korea
articles.content:
Fire Erupts in Suwon of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- There broke out fire in Suwon, Kyonggi Province on Monday, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 A big fire erupted at a construction site, leaving more than 10 workers suffocated or burned.
					
					 The fire occurred after a few days since the huge fire that claimed nearly 60 casualties in Jechon, North Chungchong Province, only to increase social uneasiness.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Nordic Political Parties and Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Nordic Political Parties and Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A joint remembrance meeting of Nordic progressive political parties and friendly organizations was held on Dec. 16 to commemorate the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display on the front wall of its venue was a painting depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 There were also photos showing the revolutionary careers and exploits of the great leaders and books and photos introducing the achievements of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants in the meeting laid floral baskets and bouquets before the painting of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, and Juha Kieksi, international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League, said that Kim Jong Il, who started the Songun revolutionary leadership with his visit to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Aug. 25, 1960, met all sorts of challenges with his unique Songun politics, safeguarded the country's sovereignty and laid a firm foundation for building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 They referred to the proud reality of the DPRK winning victory after victory in the showdown with the U.S. imperialists and performing world-startling miracles and innovations in all fields under the distinguished guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is creditably carrying forward the idea and exploits of the great leaders.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Nakhodka City, Maritime Territory, Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Nakhodka City Committee for Praising the Sun issued a joint statement on Dec. 17, the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il honorably safeguarded socialist Korea with the Songun politics and turned it into a politico-ideological and military power. These are his great exploits.
					
					 His idea and cause are being carried forward by Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people are pushing ahead with the building of a powerful socialist country, being optimistic about their future.
					
					 We pay high tribute to the great Generalissimos Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We extend firm support and solidarity to the friendly Korean people.
